{% set all_labels = [] %} {# 1. Saare labels collect karein Qty ke hisaab se #} {% for row in doc.table_xmqw %} {% for i in range(row.qty | int) %} {% set barcode_val = row.serial_no if (row.is_serialized and row.serial_no != "-") else row.item_code %} {% set _ = all_labels.append({ "barcode": barcode_val, "item_code": row.item_code }) %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %} {# 2. Pairs mein print karein #}
{% for i in range(0, all_labels|length, 2) %}
{# --- FIRST LABEL --- #} {% set data1 = all_labels[i] %} {% set item1 = frappe.get_doc("Item", data1.item_code) %}
{% set prod1 = "" %} {% if item1.custom_departments %} {% set g1 = frappe.get_all("Item Group", filters={"name": item1.custom_departments}, fields=["item_group_name"], limit=1) %} {% if g1 %}{% set prod1 = g1[0].item_group_name %}{% endif %} {% endif %} Mfd & Mkt By: TZU LIFESTYLE PVT. LTD.
21, S. Patel Nagar, New Delhi-110008, India
www.ikshita.com
Product: {{ prod1 or "Casual Collection" }}
Style: {{ item1.custom_barcode_code or "" }}
Size: {{ item1.custom_size or "" }}
Color: {{ item1.custom_colour_name or "" }}
Net Quantity: 1
Brand Name: {{ item1.brand or "IKSHITA" }}
Country Of Origin: {{ item1.country_of_origin or "INDIA" }}
{% set mrp1 = frappe.db.get_value("Item Price", {"item_code": item1.item_code, "price_list": "MRP"}, "price_list_rate") or 0 %}
M.R.P: Rs. {{ "{:,.2f}".format(mrp1) }}
(Inclusive of all taxes)
For any feedbacks/complaints Please Contact
our customer care Executive : +91-8448388640
or write us at care@tzu.co.in
{# --- SECOND LABEL --- #} {% if i + 1 < all_labels|length %} {% set data2 = all_labels[i+1] %} {% set item2 = frappe.get_doc("Item", data2.item_code) %}
{% set prod2 = "" %} {% if item2.custom_departments %} {% set g2 = frappe.get_all("Item Group", filters={"name": item2.custom_departments}, fields=["item_group_name"], limit=1) %} {% if g2 %}{% set prod2 = g2[0].item_group_name %}{% endif %} {% endif %} Mfd & Mkt By: TZU LIFESTYLE PVT. LTD.
21, S. Patel Nagar, New Delhi-110008, India
www.ikshita.com
Product: {{ prod2 or "Casual Collection" }}
Style: {{ item2.custom_barcode_code or "" }}
Size: {{ item2.custom_size or "" }}
Color: {{ item2.custom_colour_name or "" }}
Net Quantity: 1
Brand Name: {{ item2.brand or "IKSHITA" }}
Country Of Origin: {{ item2.country_of_origin or "INDIA" }}
{% set mrp2 = frappe.db.get_value("Item Price", {"item_code": item2.item_code, "price_list": "MRP"}, "price_list_rate") or 0 %}
M.R.P: Rs. {{ "{:,.2f}".format(mrp2) }}
(Inclusive of all taxes)
For any feedbacks/complaints Please Contact
our customer care Executive : +91-8448388640
or write us at care@tzu.co.in
{% endif %}
{% if (i + 2) is divisibleby 8 and not loop.last %}
{% endif %} {% endfor %}
